ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
des: "An elegant and simple cold appetizer.  Great served with water biscuits."
ins: Stir together cream cheese and spinach in a large bowl; mix well. Gently fold in Gorgonzola crumbles. Shape cheese mixture into a ball. Roll cheese ball in slivered almonds. Wrap well; chill until firm, about 1 hour.
